mapper.sql: LINE_ID, DELIVERY_ID, INV_ORG_ID, ORDER_LINE_ID, OUTSTANDING_QTY, RETURN_QTY, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, PICK_RELEASE_ID, PICK_RELEASE_LINE_ID, ITEM_ID, COUNT_ITEM_ID ,PACKAGE_ITEM_ID
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(SUM(dodl.outstanding_qty), 0) FROM om_sales_line osl, dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl WHERE dod.order_header_id = osl.header_id AND dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id AND dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND dod.inv_org_id = dodl.inv_org_id AND dod.order_header_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE (LINE_ID, DELIVERY_ID, INV_ORG_ID, ORDER_LINE_ID, OUTSTANDING_QTY, RETURN_QTY, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, PICK_RELEASE_ID, PICK_RELEASE_LINE_ID, ITEM_ID, COUNT_ITEM_ID ,PACKAGE_ITEM_ID ) values (#{lineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outstandingQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickReleaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pickReleaseLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual

mapper.update:
update DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE
DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_LINE_ID = #{orderLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OUTSTANDING_QTY = #{outstandingQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_QTY = #{returnQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICK_RELEASE_ID = #{pickReleaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PICK_RELEASE_LINE_ID = #{pickReleaseLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNT_ITEM_ID = #{countItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PACKAGE_ITEM_ID = #{packageItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where LINE_ID = #{lineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE set DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_LINE_ID = #{orderLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OUTSTANDING_QTY = #{outstandingQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURN_QTY = #{returnQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICK_RELEASE_ID = #{pickReleaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PICK_RELEASE_LINE_ID = #{pickReleaseLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_ITEM_ID = #{countItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PACKAGE_ITEM_ID = #{packageItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where LINE_ID = #{lineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT dodl.line_id ,dodl.delivery_id ,dodl.inv_org_id ,dodl.order_line_id ,dodl.outstanding_qty ,dodl.return_qty ,dodl.object_version_number ,dodl.request_id ,dodl.program_id ,dodl.creation_date ,dodl.created_by ,dodl.last_updated_by ,dodl.last_update_date ,dodl.last_update_login ,dodl.attribute_category ,dodl.attribute1 ,dodl.attribute2 ,dodl.attribute3 ,dodl.attribute4 ,dodl.attribute5 ,dodl.attribute6 ,dodl.attribute7 ,dodl.attribute8 ,dodl.attribute9 ,dodl.attribute10 ,dodl.attribute11 ,dodl.attribute12 ,dodl.attribute13 ,dodl.attribute14
,dodl.pick_release_id ,dodl.pick_release_line_id ,dodl.count_item_id ,dodl.package_item_id ,(select item_number from inv_item_b where item_id = dodl.count_item_id) count_item_number ,(select item_name from inv_item_tl where item_id = dodl.count_item_id and lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) count_item_name ,(select item_name from inv_item_tl where item_id = dodl.package_item_id and lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) package_item_name ,iib.item_id ,iib.item_number ,iit.item_name ,iib.uom_code ,osl.quantity order_line_quantity ,coalesce((SELECT SUM(coalesce(dodl2.outstanding_qty, 0)) FROM dm_order_delivery dod2 LEFT JOIN dm_order_delivery_line dodl2 ON dod2.delivery_id = dodl2.delivery_id WHERE dod2.delivery_status IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND dodl2.order_line_id = dodl.order_line_id) ,0) shipped_quantity ,coalesce(dprl.pick_quantity, 0) pick_quantity ,osl.status order_line_status ,coalesce((SELECT pv.lot_control_flag FROM INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V pv where pv.item_id = dodl.count_item_id and pv.organization_id = dodl.inv_org_id ) ,'N') batch_ctrl_flag ,(case osl.item_type when 'VI' then 9999999999 else coalesce((SELECT sum(ioqv.quantity) FROM inv_onhand_quantity ioqv WHERE ioqv.item_id = dodl.count_item_id AND ioqv.organization_id = dodl.inv_org_id) ,0) end) onhand_quantity
,(SELECT tl.meaning FROM sys_code_b scb, sys_code_value_b scvb, sys_code_value_tl tl WHERE scb.code = 'DM.SO_LINE_DELIVERY_STATUS' AND scb.code_id = scvb.code_id AND tl.code_value_id = scvb.code_value_id AND tl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND scvb.value = osl.status) order_line_status_desc ,(select name from INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL iuom where iuom.uom_code = iib.uom_code and iuom.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) uom_name ,CONCAT(osl.PARENT_LINE_ID, osl.LINE_ID) attribute15 FROM dm_order_delivery_line dodl LEFT JOIN om_sales_line osl ON osl.line_id = dodl.order_line_id LEFT JOIN inv_item_b iib ON iib.item_id = osl.item_id LEFT JOIN inv_item_tl iit ON iit.item_id = iib.item_id AND iit.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN dm_pick_release_line dprl ON dprl.pick_release_line_id = dodl.pick_release_line_id AND dprl.pick_release_id = dprl.pick_release_id WHERE dodl.delivery_id = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by attribute15

SELECT dodl.line_id ,dodl.delivery_id ,dodl.inv_org_id ,dodl.order_line_id ,dodl.outstanding_qty ,dodl.return_qty ,dodl.object_version_number ,dodl.request_id ,dodl.program_id ,dodl.creation_date ,dodl.created_by ,dodl.last_updated_by ,dodl.last_update_date ,dodl.last_update_login ,dodl.attribute_category ,dodl.attribute1 ,dodl.attribute2 ,dodl.attribute3 ,dodl.attribute4 ,dodl.attribute5 ,dodl.attribute6 ,dodl.attribute7 ,dodl.attribute8 ,dodl.attribute9 ,dodl.attribute10 ,dodl.attribute11 ,dodl.attribute12 ,dodl.attribute13 ,dodl.attribute14
,dodl.pick_release_id ,dodl.pick_release_line_id ,dodl.count_item_id ,dodl.package_item_id ,(select item_number from inv_item_b where item_id = dodl.count_item_id) count_item_number ,(select item_name from inv_item_tl where item_id = dodl.count_item_id and lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) count_item_name ,(select item_name from inv_item_tl where item_id = dodl.package_item_id and lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) package_item_name ,(SELECT opld.UNIT_PRICE FROM OM_PRICE_LIST opl,OM_PRICE_LIST_DETAIL opld WHERE opl.PRICE_LIST_ID = opld.PRICE_LIST_ID AND opld.ITEM_ID = dodl.count_item_id AND opl.SALES_ORG_ID IN (SELECT oso.SALES_ORG_ID FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso WHERE oso.HEADER_ID =#{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) and opld.LAST_UPDATE_DATE in (SELECT MAX(opld.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) FROM OM_PRICE_LIST opl,OM_PRICE_LIST_DETAIL opld WHERE opl.PRICE_LIST_ID = opld.PRICE_LIST_ID AND opld.ITEM_ID = dodl.count_item_id AND opl.SALES_ORG_ID IN (SELECT oso.SALES_ORG_ID FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso WHERE oso.HEADER_ID =#{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}))) unit_price ,iib.item_id ,iib.item_number ,iit.item_name ,iib.uom_code ,osl.quantity order_line_quantity ,(SELECT opld.UNIT_PRICE*osl.quantity FROM OM_PRICE_LIST opl,OM_PRICE_LIST_DETAIL opld WHERE opl.PRICE_LIST_ID = opld.PRICE_LIST_ID AND opld.ITEM_ID = dodl.count_item_id AND opl.SALES_ORG_ID IN (SELECT oso.SALES_ORG_ID FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso WHERE oso.HEADER_ID =#{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) and opld.LAST_UPDATE_DATE in (SELECT MAX(opld.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) FROM OM_PRICE_LIST opl,OM_PRICE_LIST_DETAIL opld WHERE opl.PRICE_LIST_ID = opld.PRICE_LIST_ID AND opld.ITEM_ID = dodl.count_item_id AND opl.SALES_ORG_ID IN (SELECT oso.SALES_ORG_ID FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso WHERE oso.HEADER_ID =#{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}))) total_money ,coalesce((SELECT SUM(coalesce(dodl2.outstanding_qty, 0)) FROM dm_order_delivery dod2 LEFT JOIN dm_order_delivery_line dodl2 ON dod2.delivery_id = dodl2.delivery_id WHERE dod2.delivery_status IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND dodl2.order_line_id = dodl.order_line_id) ,0) shipped_quantity ,coalesce(dprl.pick_quantity, 0) pick_quantity ,osl.status order_line_status ,coalesce((SELECT pv.lot_control_flag FROM INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V pv where pv.item_id = dodl.count_item_id and pv.organization_id = dodl.inv_org_id ) ,'N') batch_ctrl_flag ,(case osl.item_type when 'VI' then 9999999999 else coalesce((SELECT sum(ioqv.quantity) FROM inv_onhand_quantity ioqv WHERE ioqv.item_id = dodl.count_item_id AND ioqv.organization_id = dodl.inv_org_id) ,0) end) onhand_quantity
,(SELECT tl.meaning FROM sys_code_b scb, sys_code_value_b scvb, sys_code_value_tl tl WHERE scb.code = 'DM.SO_LINE_DELIVERY_STATUS' AND scb.code_id = scvb.code_id AND tl.code_value_id = scvb.code_value_id AND tl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND scvb.value = osl.status) order_line_status_desc ,(select name from INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL iuom where iuom.uom_code = iib.uom_code and iuom.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) uom_name ,CONCAT(osl.PARENT_LINE_ID, osl.LINE_ID) attribute15 FROM dm_order_delivery_line dodl LEFT JOIN om_sales_line osl ON osl.line_id = dodl.order_line_id LEFT JOIN inv_item_b iib ON iib.item_id = osl.item_id LEFT JOIN inv_item_tl iit ON iit.item_id = iib.item_id AND iit.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN dm_pick_release_line dprl ON dprl.pick_release_line_id = dodl.pick_release_line_id AND dprl.pick_release_id = dprl.pick_release_id WHERE dodl.delivery_id = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by attribute15

SELECT DISTINCT coalesce(SUM(dodl.outstanding_qty), 0) / (SELECT iih.quantity FROM inv_item_hierarchy iih WHERE iih.parent_item_id = oslp.item_id AND iih.item_id = osl.item_id) AS shippedqty FROM dm_order_delivery_line dodl, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY dod, om_sales_line osl, om_sales_line oslp WHERE dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND osl.parent_line_id = oslp.line_id and DOD.DELIVERY_ID = DODL.DELIVERY_ID AND osl.parent_line_id IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM inv_item_b ii WHERE ii.quantity_count_type = 'IDV' AND ii.item_type = 'PACKG' AND oslp.item_id = ii.item_id) and (dod.DELIVERY_STATUS = 'SHIPP' or dod.DELIVERY_STATUS = 'PCKUP') and oslp.LINE_ID = #{orderLineId, jdbcType=DECIMAL} GROUP BY oslp.item_id, osl.item_id, osl.line_id
